properties.areaDesc: Union, IL; Jackson, IL; Johnson, IL; Williamson, IL
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 2:19AM CST until January 11 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Northeastern Union County in southern Illinois...
Northern Johnson County in southern Illinois...
Williamson County in southern Illinois...
East central Jackson County in southern Illinois...

* Until 300 AM CST.

* At 219 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Carbondale to near Cobden to near Jonesboro,
moving northeast at 60 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Carbondale, Marion, Herrin, Carterville, Johnston City, Crainville,
Cambria, Energy, Goreville, Hurst, Pittsburg, Creal Springs, Lake
Of Egypt Area, Stonefort, Freeman Spur, Bush, Whiteash, Williamson
County Regional Airport, Colp and New Burnside.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 11.
Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 36 and 61.
properties.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
